lead_paragraph: Mamadou Sakho was sent back from Liverpool's pre-season tour of the United States because of a lack of respect towards rules but the defender's actions were not serious enough to warrant more punishment, manager Jurgen Klopp has said.

headline.print_headline: Manager Klopp Sent Sakho Back for Lack of Respect
headline.main: Manager Klopp Sent Sakho Back for Lack of Respect

snippet: Mamadou Sakho was sent back from Liverpool's pre-season tour of the United States because of a lack of respect towards rules but the defender's actions were not serious enough to warrant more punishment, manager Jurgen Klopp has said....
